name: Classic Informatics
tag_list: asp-net, php, java, perl, cloud-computing, saas, flex, air, collaboration, e-commerce, mobile-development, online-marketing, online-erp, crm
description: Web and Mobile Apps Development Agency
overview:
Classic Informatics Private Limited is a global web and mobile agency providing development and consultancy solutions to SMEs, enterprises and start-ups. We have over 130 programmers and designers on-board. We specialise in diverse solutions including web 2.0 design and development, enterprise web applications, PHP and .NET development, eCommerce solutions, CMS websites, Flex/Flash based RIAs, iPhone/iPad apps, BlackBerry apps, SEO and social media marketing.

Here is a list of our services Web Development

  • Web 2.0 Design and Development
  • Flex, Flash and Rich Internet Apps
  • Enterprise Web Applications
  • Social Media, Mash-ups and Facebook Apps
  • CMS and e-Commerce Solutions
  • SaaS, Amazon AWS and Salesforce Consulting

Mobile Development Solutions

  • iPhone/iPad Apps
  • BlackBerry Apps
  • Andriod Apps
  • Symbian Programming
  • Windows Mobile Development

Application Development

  • Product Development
  • Custom Software Development
  • Quality Assurance and Testing Services
  • Migration and Porting

Internet Marketing

  • Search Engine Optimization and Marketing
  • Social Media Marketing
  • Pay Per Click Management

Creative Services

  • Website Designing, CSS and XHTML
  • Logo and Corporate Identity Designing
  • Flash Animations and Presentations

Support and Maintenance

  • Application Support & Maintenance
  • System Admin Support
  • Performance and Scalability Monitoring
